column4: hmm, has anyone else noticed a strange behaviour,, when you set a window as ontop,, it suddenly looses the ability to be clicked on if any other non-ontop window is bhind it.
not getting it on ubuntu 10.10 on my netbook
Maybe you're using a theme that have little or no feedbacks? Also, if you're not getting it on 10.10 -- the bug got fixed, perhaps.
